name: Daleks
description: I thought that the old Dalek sprites from Doctor Who Doom were going to waste in that dusty old wad, so I took the sprites, edited and updated them and made a new improved monster out of them using the wonderful power of the Decorate lump. Use 'summon' command with 'Dalek1-5' to summon the monsters ingame, or place them in your map, this is a monster resource after all!
